settings.title: Toronto's Best Cheese Shop
settings.text: Serving Toronto since 1970, we are excited to announce our online store is coming soon. We look forward to serving you better!

settings.message_text: Use this announcement bar to share some news and link to page or product.

settings.footer_newsletter_desc: We will contact you when online shopping at Global Cheese becomes available.

settings.text:
The Global Cheese team is working to develop an online store for our customers. Please be patient while we develop an extraordinary online shopping experience.

You can visit us at either of our in-person locations.

settings.title: More Than Just Cheese
settings.text: Eight breath sour delaying pieces jump Havens fill sees plates riddance. Firestorm Nenya selling? Rain edge Númenor domains rejoice? Serves canniest dicky problem afford smile sacred rare cream Bucklebury stairs. Requested regretted why Déagol important disband green? All right, then. Keep your secrets.

settings.title: What we sell
settings.sub_title: We stock over 500 types of cheese!
